website_summaries.verdict: Chic 100% natural bamboo is perfect for an eco-friendly space.
pros: We loved the curve on the outside of the tray for serving crackers
cons: Heavy knives may cut into the board

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cheese board, great addition to any party!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cheeseboard for my son’s birthday party and was really happy it was delivered the same day I ordered it. One less thing to worry about! There was a slight imperfection in the wood which was probably the result of the manufacturing process and the merchant was great about sending me a replacement right away. Excellent customer service! I am really pleased with my cheese board purchase and received tons of complements. The design is awesome and I love the pull out knife drawer complete with cheese knives! Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jhan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheese tray!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese tray, it is just the right size and the pull-out with the knives is very cute! I gave it as a gift to a friend and she loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Surprise disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Wooden board cracked and chipped after 1 use... all I did was try to use their cutter to cut the cheese on the board lightly... then it cracked in the middle leaving a huge line across the board.. gonna return this
customer_reviews.author: Business Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cheese cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a last minute christmas present for my spouses parents. They were very pleased with it especially the pull out drawer with included utensils. I also bought them an assortment of cheese, crackers, and meat, because without those this item is like a toy with no batteries! Great purchase!

product_meta.title: DRAGONN Natural Bamboo Cheese Board & Charcuterie Platter w/ Hidden Drawer for Cheese Spreading Utensils - Perfect Gift, Serves Crackers, Meats, Fruits & Cheese
feature_bullets: 100% NATURAL BAMBOO - Cheese board includes inventive hidden drawer with various slicing, spreading, and serving tools. It's the perfect presentation piece for holiday gatherings, parties, and more!

UNIQUE GIFT IDEA - For Mom, Sister, Client, Wife, Husband, and more! Whether there's a wedding, housewarming, birthday, anniversary, or you just love entertaining, this cheese board has you covered! Impress your guests with the tray's classy appearance.

DURABLE SERVING UTENSILS - Features stainless steel blades and easy-grip bamboo handles for presentation and functionality. Removable slotted drawer seamlessly slides out from the cheese board for a surprise display.
FOOD SAFE - Bamboo material is BPA-Free, environmentally-friendly, and won’t spoil cheese with odors, colors, or chemicals.

SIZABLE BOARD - This 13” x 13” x 2” serving tray features a conveniently edged rim for presenting crackers and breads, and the elegant grain finish and warm bamboo color will make a stunning addition to your kitchen decor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars220 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
